skills.Name: Sword/Blunt Weapon Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 1.5 when using a sword or blunt weapon.

skills.Name: Heavy Armor Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 20.5 and decreases received Critical Damage by 15% when equipped with heavy armor.

skills.Name: M. Def.
skills.Description: Increases M. Def. by 24.

skills.Name: Shield Mastery
skills.Description: Shield Defense + 50% and Defense Rate + 85%. Additional P. Def. + 81 when equipped with Heavy Armor.

skills.Name: Tribunal
skills.Description: Call forth the holy energy surrounding you to judge your target, dealing 460 Holy Physical Damage. Reduces weapon resistance for 30 seconds.

skills.Name: Gust Blade
skills.Description: Attacks nearby targets with 345 Physical Damage. Can be used while a sword/dualsword/blunt weapon is equipped. Over-hit. Critical.

skills.Name: Heavenly Strike
skills.Description: Chant a prayer to smite the enemy with holy magic, hitting the target for 510 holy Physical Damage. Additionally drains MP in PvP.

skills.Name: Superior Aggression
skills.Description: Provokes the target to attack with 6600 Power.

skills.Name: Aggression Aura
skills.Description: Provokes nearby enemies to attack with 4544 Power.

skills.Name: Arrest
skills.Description: Provokes the enemy to attack dealing 50 Physical Damage, immobilizing them for 4 seconds and regains 15%% MP.

skills.Name: Eva's Blessing
skills.Description: Restores the target's HP with 275 Power.

skills.Name: Poison Recovery
skills.Description: Cures the user of moderate poisoning.

skills.Name: Summon Aqua Cubic
skills.Description: Summons Aqua Cubic. Aqua Cubic uses attack magic that inflicts continuous damage to the enemy. Requires 2 Spirit Ore.

skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 20.5 and decreases received Critical Damage by 15% when equipped with heavy armor.

skills.Name: M. Def.
skills.Description: Increases M. Def. by 24.

skills.Name: Focus Mind
skills.Description: Increases MP Recovery Bonus by 3.1.

skills.Name: Cubic Mastery
skills.Description: Ability to summon 2 Cubics at once.

skills.Name: Spirit Barrier
skills.Description: Increases M. Def. by 15% for 20 minutes.

skills.Name: Ultimate Defense
